meanings.sent1: The bourgeoisifications of the neighborhood led to higher property prices.
meanings.sent2: She observed the gradual bourgeoisifications of the local businesses.
meanings.sent3: The sudden bourgeoisifications of the old town brought a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent4: The bourgeoisifications of the once bohemian area were evident in the new cafes and boutiques.
meanings.sent5: The rapid bourgeoisifications of the city transformed its character completely.

meanings.definition: The act of making something bourgeois.
meanings.sent1: His art aimed at the bourgeoisifications of traditional themes.
meanings.sent2: The bourgeoisifications of the art scene were met with mixed reactions.
meanings.sent3: The extravagant bourgeoisifications of the party decorations surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her fashion designs were a subtle bourgeoisifications of streetwear.
meanings.sent5: The film depicted the gradual bourgeoisifications of a small village.
